Articles.Content: Is there a mod that makes it so that contracts give you more time to complete them? Cause I use KCT, and I keep getting contracts that expire in 1-2 days. It just isn't possible to make an orbital station around minmus in a day! Are there any mods that make it more realistic? Like an orbital station around minmus in... 100 days? A year?

>It just isn't possible to make an orbital station around minmus in a day! 

Indeed, it normally takes about 8 days to get to Minmus even if you build instantly (not using KCT).

Normally there's two dates on the contract. The first is how long the contract is offered (1-2 days), and then how long you have to complete it (usually months or years). Are you sure you're not reading the first date when you should be looking at the second?

If you have a contract that is showing you only have a day to accept and complete it, please take a screenshot.

The expiration time of 1-2 days is for accepting the contract.

For actually fulfilling it, you generally have a very long time. Even contracts to "test part X while landed at Kerbin" give you something like 5 Kerbal years worth of time.
Thanks! That makes a lot of sense! I was probally reading the wrong number! My bad!
